name: Dahi Vada
description: Soft lentil dumplings soaked in curd, topped with chutneys and spices.

name: Punjabi Paratha
description: Flaky stuffed paratha served hot with butter and pickle.

name: Masala Dosa
description: Crispy South Indian dosa stuffed with spicy potato filling, served with chutney & sambar.

name: Pakode
description: Crispy fritters made from gram flour and spices, perfect for tea-time.

name: Pyaaz Kachori
description: Deep-fried pastry stuffed with spicy onion filling, a famous Rajasthani snack.

name: Kachori
description: Fried flaky snack stuffed with spiced lentil filling, served with chutney.

name: Samosa
description: Popular Indian snack with potato and peas stuffing, deep-fried till crispy.

name: Ker Sangari
description: Traditional Rajasthani dish made with dried ker berries and sangri beans cooked with spices.

name: Ghevar
description: Traditional Rajasthani sweet soaked in sugar syrup, often enjoyed during festivals.

name: Rajasthani Thali
description: Grand platter with multiple Rajasthani dishes including dal, bati, churma and more.

name: Special Thali
description: Assorted thali offering a variety of dishes, perfect for a hearty meal.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Soft and juicy milk-based sweet dumplings soaked in flavored sugar syrup.

name: Idli Sambhar
description: Steamed rice cakes served with piping hot sambar and coconut chutney.

name: Mirchi Bada
description: Spicy green chilies stuffed and coated in gram flour batter, deep-fried till crispy.

name: Pulav
description: Aromatic rice dish cooked with spices and vegetables, often served with raita.

name: Gatta Masala
description: Rajasthani specialty of gram flour dumplings cooked in spicy curd gravy.

name: Palak Paneer
description: Cubes of paneer cooked in a rich spinach-based gravy, served with roti or rice.

name: Pasta
description: Creamy or spicy pasta loaded with vegetables, cheese, and herbs.

name: Dum Aloo
description: Baby potatoes cooked slowly in a rich, spicy tomato-based gravy.

name: Paneer Masala
description: Rich and creamy tomato-based gravy with soft cubes of paneer, served with naan or rice.
